Cannot use during other Team's Turn ({0})
Cannot Hurry if City is Damaged
Increases the future cost of this action in the city

(You can disable tutorial events by unchecking "Tutorial" in Options.)

Force March Unit (Can Move while Fatigued)
A Unit cannot attack until the turn after it Unlimbered
After Anchoring, Land Units can move through Water Tiles within the Anchored Unit's movement range.

Sleep (until unit is moved or attacked)
Sentry (wake if an Enemy appears within {0_value} Tiles)

Too far from a friendly City
Reduces the Cooldown of Adjacent Units and gives {0_yield} for each one
Can only use one Offensive per {0_turnScale}
Must be in City Territory with {0,1_religion}
Requires an established link(CONCEPT_THEOLOGY) from the previous tier
Available theologies (use a Disciple to establish):
(Must be at {0_peace} and adjacent to Tribal Site)

Barbarians following your link(CONCEPT_STATE_RELIGION) are less likely to
declare {0_warLink}
Your Debt was {0_money} at the end of the {1_turnScale}.
{0_action} which cannot be stored are sold for {1_training}.
link(CONCEPT_GENERAL,2) have a small ({0_number}%) chance of being injured when the Unit is attacked.
Replay the entire game{true_0: in 1-Turn steps}
Replay the actions over the last Turn
Replay the actions over the last {0_number} Turns
Cancel the replay and return to live action
Upgrades convert a Combat Unit to a different, more advanced type, at the cost of some Training, and other Unit specific resources.

Units and Characters can earn XP (Experience), which can be used for a link(CONCEPT_PROMOTION), or to improve a Character Trait. Units earn XP during combat, or by being link(CONCEPT_IDLE) on a Training link(CONCEPT_IMPROVEMENT). link(UNITTRAIT_MELEE) Units train in a link(IMPROVEMENT_BARRACKS), and link(UNITTRAIT_RANGED) units train at a link(IMPROVEMENT_RANGE). Characters earn XP through performing missions, holding roles such as link(CONCEPT_GENERAL), link(CONCEPT_GOVERNOR) or link(CONCEPT_COUNCILOR), and through events or other Character actions.

Use AI to finish turn
to auto-play {0_number} turnturns
When your happiness bar depletes, your city will experience negative modifiers.
When your happiness bar fills, a positive event will occur in your city.
Agents can be sent to Cities with link(CONCEPT_AGENT_NETWORK,1) to conduct Missions and siphon off a percentage of their Yields.

Insert link(UNIT_SCOUT,1) into a Foreign City to gain visibility. A Character can then be sent to the City to serve as link(CONCEPT_AGENT,1). The link(UNIT_SCOUT) will be returned after int(AGENT_NETWORK_TURNS) Turns.

The player can give Move and Attack Orders to the Units of an Allied link(CONCEPT_TRIBE), and found Cities near their link(CONCEPT_SETTLEMENT,2). Allied link(CONCEPT_TRIBE,2) will share your Diplomatic stance toward other link(CONCEPT_TRIBE,2) and Nations, including joining you in link(DIPLOMACY_WAR). You can have an Alliance with only one link(CONCEPT_TRIBE) at a time.

Allied Nations Will share your Diplomatic stance toward other link(CONCEPT_TRIBE,2) and Nations, including joining you in link(DIPLOMACY_WAR). The player can have an Alliance with only one other Nation.
Units can Buy Tiles adjacent to your Territory from their Unit Panel, if you have the link(LAW_COLONIZATION) Law.
A wave of units from a link(CONCEPT_TRIBE) set out to attack in a massive invasion.
You can Undo as many decisions as you want using CTRL+Z.
{0_player} will capture {1_city} in {2_turns} more {3_turnScale}. (Must keep a Military Unit in the City.)
Caravan Units can be sent on a Caravan Mission to a Foreign Capital. Upon safe arrival, the Caravan is consumed, you receive a lump sum of link(YIELD_MONEY), and there is a mutual Opinion boost.
Foreign Cities connected to your {0_capital} (Requires link(DIPLOMACY_PEACE)): (Larger and more distant cities produce more)
Critical Hits deal double damage. Critical Hit chance is improved with the Focus link(CONCEPT_PROMOTION,2), and by some link(CONCEPT_GENERAL,2).
link(YIELD_CULTURE) Events occur when a City's link(YIELD_CULTURE) bar fills up.
int(DISTANCE_MODIFIER)% per Tile for link(UNITTRAIT_RANGED) Units.
You cannot attack each other.{br}They will not send link(TRIBE_RAIDERS) against you.{br}They can enter and heal in your territory.
You cannot attack each other.{br}They are less likely to declare link(DIPLOMACY_WAR) against you.{br}You can enter and heal in each other's territory.
You can attack each other freely.
Opinion change from {0_discontentIcon} Level of Family Cities.
Families with fewer Cities than others will be more envious, and have a lower Opinion of your Leader.
The first City given to a Family. They get special bonuses beyond other Cities of the same Family.

Families are the leading clans of your empire, with different dispositions and conflicting interests. They are granted control of your Cities, for which their particular bonuses are important to consider. Their preferences control what link(CONCEPT_AMBITION,2) you can pursue, and their opinions of you can lead to different events.
Based on number of military units for each family
Based on total citizens and specialists for family's cities
link(UNIT_SCOUT,2), link(UNIT_SETTLER,2) and link(UNIT_WORKER,2) can Harvest a Resource for a quick supply of Goods. The Resource cannot be Harvested again until it randomly recharges.
This {0_resource} has been Harvested and cannot be Harvested again until it randomly recharges.

A Forced March permits a Unit to continue moving this turn when out of Moves, at the cost of int(UNIT_MARCH_COST) link(YIELD_TRAINING)icon(YIELD_TRAINING), and twice as many link(YIELD_ORDERS)icon(YIELD_ORDERS) per additional Move.
A Unit becomes Fatigued after using all of its Moves. A Fatigued Unit will refresh its Moves the next turn. Once Fatigued, a Unit can only Move again this turn through a link(CONCEPT_MARCH).
Flanking occurs when attacking an enemy Unit with a friendly Unit on the opposite side. For example, if you are attacking from the West of a target, you must have another Unit to its East.

Ambitions are goals for you to pursue, and completing them will grant you a permanent boost to link(CONCEPT_LEGITIMACY). Complete ten Ambitions and link(CONCEPT_LEGACY,2), and you win link(VICTORY_AMBITION,1) Victory

When the Leader dies, all the current link(CONCEPT_AMBITION,2) become Legacies, which must be completed in int(LEGACY_MAX_TURNS) Turns. Failing to finish a Legacy in time will reduce your link(CONCEPT_LEGITIMACY). Complete ten link(CONCEPT_AMBITION,2) and Legacies, and you win link(VICTORY_AMBITION,1) Victory
Tribes can engage in limited diplomacy, but generally won't be coordinated the way opposing Nations are.

Hidden units cannot be seen by other Units. link(UNIT_SCOUT,2) are Hidden while on a link(VEGETATION_TREES) Tile in Neutral or Friendly territory, or at all times with a link(TRAIT_SCHEMER_ARCHETYPE) Leader. Hiddens Units have a int(HIDDEN_ATTACK_MODIFIER)% modifier when attacking.
Generals can boost the stats of a Unit. Generals must be younger than int(GENERAL_START_AGE) to be assigned to a Unit, and they are retired at int(GENERAL_RETIRE_AGE).
Governors can be appointed in Cities with link(IMPROVEMENT_GARRISON_1,1) to provide a boost to Yields.
Councilors can fill the role of link(COUNCIL_CHANCELLOR), link(COUNCIL_AMBASSADOR), or link(COUNCIL_SPYMASTER).
Specialists can boost the Yields of an link(CONCEPT_IMPROVEMENT) at the cost of some link(YIELD_CIVICS).
Shrines provide various benefits, and can help to spread Paganism.
Idle Units are not yet on Cooldown, and are thus eligible to perform more actions this turn, such as an Attack, link(CONCEPT_PROMOTION), or link(CONCEPT_UPGRADE).
Ignores the Zone-of-Control of enemy Units.

Legitimacy comes from achieving link(CONCEPT_AMBITION,2), and acquiring better link(CONCEPT_COGNOMEN,2) (such as link(COGNOMEN_GREAT)). Higher Legitimacy improves Family Opinions, and produces more link(YIELD_ORDERS) per year.

Adopting a link(CONCEPT_STATE_RELIGION) improves that Religion's opinion of your Nation, and also both reduces link(YIELD_DISCONTENT) and enables the recruitment of link(CONCEPT_DISCIPLE,2) in your Cities of that Religion.
A Cognomen is an acquired title that increases the Legitimacyicon(YIELD_LEGITIMACY) of your Leader
Luxuries can be Traded to a City to reduce link(YIELD_DISCONTENT). They can also be Traded to other Nations, link(CONCEPT_TRIBE,2), and link(CONCEPT_FAMILY,2) to improve their Opinion of your Nation.

Tribal Mercenary Units can be hired from link(CONCEPT_TRIBE,2) by Carthage, and by Nations with link(TRAIT_ORATOR_ARCHETYPE) Leaders. Other Mercenaries are hired from events. They have no associated link(CONCEPT_FAMILY), and int(CONSUMPTION_MERCENARY_MODIFIER)% higher consumption costs.
Will produce a new unit in {0} {1_turnScale}
Repair the {0_improvement}, or it will be destroyed in {1_turns} {2_turnScale}.
Projects are internal City enhancements such as an link(PROJECT_ARCHIVE_1), or link(PROJECT_WALLS).
Promotions provide various combat buffs at the cost of some link(YIELD_TRAINING).
Upgrade an Improvement to the next level (for example, link(IMPROVEMENT_THEATER_1) to link(IMPROVEMENT_THEATER_2)).
link(UNIT_WORKER,2) can build link(CONCEPT_URBAN) and Rural Improvements for your Cities on available Tiles.
Rebel Units can appear outside of Cities with a high link(YIELD_DISCONTENT). Like link(TRIBE_BARBARIANS), you are always at link(DIPLOMACY_WAR) with Rebels.
A Character's Desired link(CONCEPT_AMBITION) will become a new National link(CONCEPT_AMBITION) if s/he becomes the Leader.
A Disciple can spread your link(CONCEPT_STATE_RELIGION), and purge other Religions from your Cities.
Roads extend your link(CONCEPT_TRADE_NETWORK), improve Unit Movement, and connect Cities.
link(UNITTRAIT_MOUNTED) Units, after killing an enemy, may make a followup attack on adjacent enemy Units on the same turn.
Settlement Tiles include Cities and Tribal Sites.

Establishing a Theology grants additional bonuses to a World Religion. Theologies are established using Disciples, and, once established, will be active for all Nations that adopt the associated Religion.
The Trade Network consists of all Tiles connected to your Capital{0_capital} via a {1_roads}, a {2_roads}, or open Water.
If any of your opponents reach {0_points} points, the game ends
A Unit exerts Zone-of-Control over all adjacent Tiles (except across a {0_riverLink}), which prevents enemy Units from moving through them. Hold [{1_key}] to see Unit ZOCs.
No keybind has been specified for this hotkey.
Cannot build on a Harvested Tile
Location where a City can be founded by a link(UNIT_SETTLER). Can be occupied by a Tribe Site. Does not remove Vegetation
Cannot be built outside own territory
Must be Adjacent to City or {true_0:one {1_urban} Coast Tile:two {1_urban} Tiles}
Cannot be Adjacent to another Religion
Can Move on Land or Water
(Fatigued Units cannot move without Force March)
<true_1>If Same Unit Adjacent: {0_value}<false>{0_value} If Same Unit Adjacent<end>
Cannot die with more than 1 HP
Can Hurry City Production with link(YIELD_CIVICS)
Can Hurry City Production with link(YIELD_TRAINING)
Can Hurry City Production with link(YIELD_MONEY)
Can Hurry City Production with Population
Can Hurry City Production with link(YIELD_ORDERS)
Can Build link(CONCEPT_URBAN) Improvements and link(CONCEPT_ROAD,2) on {0_terrain}
A City is connected to its {0_capital}
Hold [{0_key}] to see Tiles connected to your Capital{1_capital}.
Citizens can be used to create new Specialists
{0_value} XP for All Units during Combat
Can Sell for the same price as Buying
No Extra Unit Consumption Costs when {0_outsideBorders}
Free link(CONCEPT_AGENT) in all Holy Cities
Can serve as link(CONCEPT_GENERAL), link(CONCEPT_GOVERNOR), or link(CONCEPT_AGENT).
+1 VP per Extra Step (II, III, etc)
Less likely to be in a Random Event
Cannot be a link(CONCEPT_GOVERNOR), link(CONCEPT_GENERAL), or on the Council
{0_value} Opinion if not of your link(CONCEPT_STATE_RELIGION)
{0_value} Opinion if too close to us
{0_value} Opinion if more knowledgeable than us

{0_value} Opinion if more Active Laws than us

{0_value} Opinion if more Trades with another Nation than with us
{0_opinion}: You are very close to winning
{0}% Chance/{1_turnScale} of Spreading to new Cities
{0_value}: Our Units are inside Our Territory
{0_value}: Hostile Units are inside Our Territory
Connects current Tile to the selected Tile's network using the shortest path
Max One Tier {0} link(CONCEPT_THEOLOGY) per Religion
{0}: You do not follow {1_religion}, the link(CONCEPT_STATE_RELIGION) of {2_player}
{0}: Your Cognomen ({1_cognomen}) is greater than mine ({2_cognomen})
{0}: More Trades with another Nation, {1}, than with {3_player}, {2}
Will stop being the link(CONCEPT_AGENT) in {0_city}

Active player surrenders and becomes controlled by the AI
Nations must be Unique when Characters are enabled
Cannot Declare link(DIPLOMACY_WAR) on the {0_barbarians} for {1_value} more {2_turnScale}.
Cannot Declare link(DIPLOMACY_WAR) on {0_team} for {1_value} more {2_turnScale}.

Give your newest City, {0_city}, to one of your Families...

You have an important Decision to make first...
You have to choose a new technology to research first...
Establish {0} link(CONCEPT_THEOLOGY) for a World Religion
Requires {0_diplomacy} with All Tribes and Nations
Requires {0_diplomacy} with {1} {singular_1:Tribe or Nation:Tribes or Nations}
Cannot change Succession Laws when the Leader is Dead
